fields.text: Welcome to Sonder, an entirely new way to stay in your favorite neighborhoods around the world.
To make a new reservation, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our reservations team.
To inquire about long-term stays, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our extended stays specialist.
For assistance with existing bookings and customer support, press [INDEX].
To modify or cancel your reservation, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our booking support team.
For billing or payment inquiries, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our billing department.
